description: BitCode is known for it's industry standard, best quality training. Our innovative training methodologies help students build a strong technical base and secure a great career!
450+ Recruiters 90% + Avg. Placement 25+ Avg Calls per student 2.4 lacs/anum Avg. Sal
Our students get chance to work on live projects, which helps them sharpen their skills and develop better understanding of technology.
We provide placement support to our students till the time they don't get through. In this coomplete placement process we are very transparent to our students as well as recruiters.
